title: Parl. vote of no confidence means new govt. formed

content.prompt: A successful vote of no confidence in a parliamentary system means that

choices.label: new elections for the legislature are called
the head of state will dissolve the national legislature
all laws passed by the legislature in that session are voided
the government steps down and a new government must be formed
the heads of both state and government must step down from their posts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
